abstract: Intel has overhauled the basic building block of the information age, paving the way for faster and more energy-efficient processors.
snippet: Intel has overhauled the basic building block of the information age, paving the way for faster and more energy-efficient processors.
lead_paragraph: Intel, the world’s largest chip maker, has overhauled the basic building block of the information age, paving the way for a new generation of faster and more energy-efficient processors.

headline.main: Intel Says Chips Will Run Faster, Using Less Power
headline.print_headline: INTEL SAYS CHIPS WILL RUN FASTER, USING LESS POWER
